title: Wallet & Post-Deployment
description:
When you go to deploy your protocol, you'll want to think about a number of things, but two of the most important are. 

1. Which wallet to use?
2. Is there anything to consider after I deploy my smart contracts?

We'll go over the risks of different types of wallets, and all the steps you'll need to take even after you deploy your smart contracts.

overview.learnings:
1. Tradeoffs between browser, hardware, multi-sig, and other kinds of wallets
2. What you'll need to know & do once you've deployed your contracts
3. Resources for reaching out for help in case a smart contract of yours is attacked
4. How to write a simple monitoring script for your smart contracts
preRequisites: 2. You've used a blockchain wallet before
3. (optional, but preferred) You've completed the security & auditing course on Cyfrin Updraft
